pages.text: While technically not with any power, $(item)Occult Paraphernalia$() are still nice to have around.$(br)They usually serve as simple decoration, but they may sometimes help with things beyond $(o)the ambiance$().
Candles may be stacked to an extent.$(br)They can be lit using $(item)Flint and Steel$().
Wax is fabricated by simply smelting $(item)Honey Combs$().

$(item)Murals$() are simple objects of worship finely carved from a material. They are usually found in $(l:miskatonicmysteries:world/shrines)$(marked)Shrines$() and always dedicated to a Great Old One.

$(item)Idols$() are more complex objects of worship and almost always found in Shrines.$(br)Much like Murals, they are dedicated to a Great Old One.$(br)Unlike Murals, they are actually of slightly supernatural nature. Worshippers find a lot of power in them, especially after rest.
